document_data.name: Zulpair
document_data.symbol: A golden prow and white spray on navy blue waves, under a silver star, on a field of purple
document_data.mainbody: The '''Zulpair''' family was a [[Waterdhavian]] noble family.{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|8}}
document_data.Activities: This family made its money through shipping goods with their merchant ships.
document_data.Members:
* [[Olomar Zulpair]], patriarch as of [[1372 DR]]
* [[Anyla Zulpair]], consort of Olomar
* [[Gerath Zulpair]], eldest son of Olomar and heir to the family
